name: Clone
description: A PostCSS Front-End clone used to init new projects.

scripts.modernizr: cd bower_components/modernizr/ && npm install && node ./bin/modernizr -c ../../modernizr-config.json && cd ../../ && cp bower_components/modernizr/modernizr.js vendor/
scripts.slick: cp bower_components/slick-carousel/slick/slick.css vendor/ && cp bower_components/slick-carousel/slick/slick.js vendor/ && cp bower_components/slick-carousel/slick/slick-theme.css vendor/
scripts.clone: bower install && rm -rf vendor && mkdir vendor && rm -rf fonts && mkdir fonts && npm run fontawesome && npm run ionicons && npm run jquery && npm run matchMedia && npm run modernizr && npm run normalize && npm run slick
scripts.post: postcss post/*.css -c postcss.config.js -d css && node notify.js
